DOC.brief_title: Transdermal ( TDS ) Oxybutynin ( Oxytrol ( r ) ) Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: Adult patient one symptom overactive bladder , include urge urinary incontinence , urgency and/or frequency Patients Oxytrol ( r ) contraindicate . Patients treat Oxytrol ( r ) prior participation study . Patients reside longterm care facility nurse home .
